snippet: A Cairo court sentenced a man to one year in jail on Saturday for harassing a woman, the swiftest such ruling since Egypt introduced a new law in early June to combat sexual harassment....

headline.print_headline: Egypt Jails Man for a Year as Push Against Sexual Harassment Begins
headline.main: Egypt Jails Man for a Year as Push Against Sexual Harassment Begins

lead_paragraph: A Cairo court sentenced a man to one year in jail on Saturday for harassing a woman, the swiftest such ruling since Egypt introduced a new law in early June to combat sexual harassment.
